subject: Travel
title: Cheek Kissing in Europe
description: A short lesson to help you apply Cheek Kissing in Europe.

hook.text: In France, the number of cheek kisses changes depending on which region you're visiting.

buildup.text: Paris does two kisses. Southern France does three. Some areas of Corsica demand five.

discovery.text: The Dutch do three. Belgians do one or three, never two. Brazilians do two but start on the right.

twist.text: In the Middle East, men greet men with kisses. But kissing someone of the opposite sex can be illegal.

climax.text: After COVID-19, many cultures reduced cheek kissing. Some may never fully bring it back.

punchline.text: Every country kisses differently and all of them think they're right.

quiz.question: How many cheek kisses are customary in Paris?
